text: Javadoc provides the possible to use a doc-files directory in the package-path to include any miscellaneous files for using the files in the package.html. If I execute following line the doc-files dir is created as expected. javadoc -d -subpackages de -docfilessubdirs -sourcepath But the Ant-Version don't create the doc-files dir: ... ... PRG API]]> When I include the doc-files-dir in the fileset I get a Illegal Package error.
